text: Turkish Delight () is a 1973 Dutch romantic drama movie directed by Paul Verhoeven and is based on the 1969 novel Turks fruit by Jan Wolkers. It stars Rutger Hauer in his movie debut, Monique van de Ven and was nominated for 1 Oscar in 1974. == Other websites == * * * Category:1973 romantic drama movies Category:1970s erotic movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:Dutch romance movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Paul Verhoeven
title: Turkish Delight (movie)
